messages.message: Great to see Custom Function fields. Am I missing something or is this coming soon (appreciate it's internal only at present), but I cannot seem to be able to leverage any extraction fields / arguments for my functions?

@Tom Murphy, I noticed that if you click ‘Add field’ and set the field type to “Custom function” (hence taking you to the above view) before you give the field a name that you see “No available fields”.

If you name the field first you should see the field arguments

Ah ... so if I now give my field a name and the custom function a name it shows argument options.

Thanks @Arjun - although probably good to note, as not immediately obvious (at least to me)
Ah I presume this is on prod? This has been fixed for 24.28 where custom function fields will be feature complete. Thanks for testing custom function fields and giving feedback!
